InformationObject.name: Connection
InformationObject.designDesc: Connection, that is complete integration between two parties

InformationObject.name: TransferPackage
InformationObject.designDesc: Transfer package, whose folder under Connection is used as content storage location

InformationObject.name: InformationChangeItem
InformationObject.designDesc: Item that describes information object change. ID is guid prefixed with UTC timerange.

InformationObject.name: GenericCollectionableObject
InformationObject.designDesc: Generic object that is put to mastercollection for Generic Objects

OperationSpec.Description: Perform connection operation with parameters obtained from inputstream and outputing to outputstream. (De)Serializing done to ConnectionCommunicationData object.

Parameter.name: OutputStream
Parameter.designDesc: Output stream for connection response output

TargetDefinition.name: ConnectionCommunicationData
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Connection communicating data obtained from DeviceContext

MethodExecute.name: PerformOperation
MethodExecute.designDesc: Perform operation based on communication data request

MethodExecute.name: SerializeCommunicationDataToOutput
MethodExecute.designDesc: Serialize communication data to output

OperationSpec.Description: Publish categorized content over connection

MethodExecute.name: CallDeviceSyncToSendContent
MethodExecute.designDesc: Call device sync to copy content

ReturnValue.name: WasAnythingCopiedOrDeleted
ReturnValue.designDesc: Was anything copied in the sync operation

MethodExecute.name: CallOtherSideProcessingForCopiedContent
MethodExecute.designDesc: Call other side to process copied content

OperationSpec.Description: Sets category linking for connection

TargetDefinition.name: Connection
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Connection to set the linking info to

MethodExecute.name: SetConnectionLinkingData
MethodExecute.designDesc: Set connection linking data

MethodExecute.name: StoreObject
MethodExecute.designDesc: Store objects

OperationSpec.Description: Sync connection content to device to send

TargetDefinition.name: PackageContentListingProcessID
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Process ID for listing package contents

MethodExecute.name: ExecuteContentListingProcess
MethodExecute.designDesc: Process execution to list package content items

MethodExecute.name: CopyContentsToSyncRoot
MethodExecute.designDesc: Copy content listing to sync root

OperationSpec.Description: Push collaboration content to given connection ID

Parameter.name: ConnectionID
Parameter.designDesc: Connection ID to push the content with

TargetDefinition.name: PackageContentListingOperationName
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Operation name for package listing operation

MethodExecute.name: DynamicPackageListingOperation
MethodExecute.designDesc: Dynamic operation execution of content packaging operation

TargetDefinition.name: TransferPackage
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Transferpackage that identifies the data to package and send

MethodExecute.name: AddTransferPackageToConnection
MethodExecute.designDesc: Adds transfer package to outgoing packages of connection

MethodExecute.name: StoreObject
MethodExecute.designDesc: Stores objects

MethodExecute.name: PackageTransferPackageContent
MethodExecute.designDesc: Package contents for transfer package

MethodExecute.name: SendTransferPackageContent
MethodExecute.designDesc: Send package contents through connection

MethodExecute.name: SetTransferPackageAsProcessed
MethodExecute.designDesc: Set transfer package as prosessed state

MethodExecute.name: StoreObjectComplete
MethodExecute.designDesc: Stores connection with processed transferpackage

OperationSpec.Description: Submit collaboration data to other owner. Data is positioned under collab/submitting_owner_id/TheBall.Interface/InterfaceData/
Create interface operation for execution. Return ID to follow-up on status.

Parameter.name: OperationData
Parameter.designDesc: Operation data as raw binary to be stored next to operation data

TargetDefinition.name: Operation
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Operation object to be saved along with the data

TargetDefinition.name: OperationDataLocation
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Operation data object location to store

MethodExecute.name: StoreOperationWithData
MethodExecute.designDesc: Store operation object with its data

ReturnValue.name: OperationID
ReturnValue.designDesc: Operation ID of newly created operation

OperationSpec.Description: Execute legacy operation from HTTP Request data as from direct request (forms etc supported)

TargetDefinition.name: RequestData
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Request data retrieved from operation context

MethodExecute.name: ExecutePostRequest
MethodExecute.designDesc: Execute legacy request as-if it was submitted

OperationSpec.Description: Execute given operation

Parameter.name: UseSQLiteDB
Parameter.designDesc: Use SQLite database; calling syncs before and after

TargetDefinition.name: OperationDataLocation
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Operation data object location to store

MethodExecute.name: PreExecuteSyncSQLiteFromStorage
MethodExecute.designDesc: Sync storage to SQLite data if SQLite is used

MethodExecute.name: ExecuteOperation
MethodExecute.designDesc: Execute interface operation. Delete operation + data if succesful; update statistics otherwise with error info.

MethodExecute.name: PostExecuteSyncStorageFromSQLite
MethodExecute.designDesc: Sync SQLite data to storage if SQLite is used

OperationSpec.Description: Delete given operation with its associated data

TargetDefinition.name: OperationBlobLocation
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Operation blob location to be removed

TargetDefinition.name: OperationDataBlobLocation
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Operation data blob location to be removed

MethodExecute.name: DeleteOperationWithData
MethodExecute.designDesc: Delete interface operation with its associated data

OperationSpec.Description: Put interface operation to queue

TargetDefinition.name: QueueItemFileNameFormat
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Queue item file name as: timestamp_ownerprefix_ownerid_operationid

TargetDefinition.name: QueueItemFullPath
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Queue item filename format populated with data and combined with queue owner and location

MethodExecute.name: CreateQueueEntry
MethodExecute.designDesc: Create queue entry to item with content of invoker account within

OperationSpec.Description: Fetch oldest-first queue entries, group by owner and lock whole oldest-entry-owning owner for processing (retry for next oldest if lock wasn't possible). Return all found entries of that owner

Parameter.name: DedicatedToOwner
Parameter.designDesc: Dedicated to owner - null if not dedicated

TargetDefinition.name: OwnerGroupedItems
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Grouped data by owner; preserving alphabetical order for oldest-first

MethodExecute.name: AcquireFirstObtainableLock
MethodExecute.designDesc: Acquire first lock from grouped items, that is obtainable. List operation IDs as lock content.

ReturnValue.name: LockedOwnerPrefix
ReturnValue.designDesc: Locked owner prefix acc or grp (if lock acquired)

ReturnValue.name: OperationIDs
ReturnValue.designDesc: Operation IDs of obtained lock or null if failed to get lock

ReturnValue.name: OperationQueueItems
ReturnValue.designDesc: Operation queue items included in lock

ReturnValue.name: LockedOwnerPrefix
ReturnValue.designDesc: Locked owner prefix acc or grp (if lock acquired)

ReturnValue.name: OperationIDs
ReturnValue.designDesc: Operation IDs of obtained lock or null if failed to get lock

ReturnValue.name: OperationQueueItems
ReturnValue.designDesc: Operation queue items included in lock

OperationSpec.Description: Fetch oldest-first queue entries, group by owner and lock whole oldest-entry-owning owner for processing (retry for next oldest if lock wasn't possible). Return all found entries of that owner

Parameter.name: InstanceName
Parameter.designDesc: Instance name to run the operations against

Parameter.name: LockedOwnerPrefix
Parameter.designDesc: Locked owner prefix acc or grp (if lock acquired)

Parameter.name: OperationIDs
Parameter.designDesc: Operation IDs of obtained lock or null if failed to get lock

Parameter.name: OperationQueueItems
Parameter.designDesc: Operation queue items included in this execution

MethodExecute.name: ExecuteOperationsAndReleaseLock
MethodExecute.designDesc: Execute operations one by one, delete queue items after each execution, delete lock item after all executed.

OperationSpec.Description: Updates status summary for given owner, based on changed ID lists and time range. Blocks IDlist with prefixing T:-timestamp- value before respective IDs. If two timestamps match, the latter is added with one unit/tick/ms to make it newer. IDs do not appear in the list multiple times, but are always represented by the latest update item.

Parameter.name: UpdateTime
Parameter.designDesc: Starting time of changes updated in this cycle

Parameter.name: ChangedIDList
Parameter.designDesc: Changed ID list on this cycle

Parameter.name: RemoveExpiredEntriesSeconds
Parameter.designDesc: Remove entries older than amount of seconds given here

MethodExecute.name: EnsureUpdateOnStatusSummary
MethodExecute.designDesc: Guarantee update on StatusSummary, retry if fails. Time-stamp blockify the IDs, placing ID aways highest in the graph. Remove expired blocks entirely.

OperationSpec.Description: Delete connection with its structures and transfer storage contents

Parameter.name: IsLaunchedByRemoteDelete
Parameter.designDesc: Is the deletion launched by remote connection

MethodExecute.name: CallDeleteOnOtherEndAndDeleteOtherEndDevice
MethodExecute.designDesc: Call delete on other end - if this is active party. Otherwise delete device associated with this connection. Ignore failure regardless

MethodExecute.name: DeleteConnectionIntermediateContent
MethodExecute.designDesc: Delete connection's intermediate content, including transfer connect

MethodExecute.name: DeleteConnectionProcesses
MethodExecute.designDesc: Delete connection attached processes

MethodExecute.name: DeleteConnectionObject
MethodExecute.designDesc: Delete the actual connection object

MethodExecute.name: StoreConnection

MethodExecute.name: NegotiateDeviceConnection
MethodExecute.designDesc: Negotiate device connection

OperationSpec.Description: Executes connection's bound process by its name.

Parameter.name: ConnectionProcessToExecute
Parameter.designDesc: Pre-defined list of hardcoded names to match the connection process fields

MethodExecute.name: PerformProcessExecution
MethodExecute.designDesc: Execute the defined process

OperationSpec.Description: Finalizes connection with negotiating connection ID pairs between participants.

MethodExecute.name: CallDeviceServiceForFinalizing
MethodExecute.designDesc: Call device based service for finalizing

MethodExecute.name: UpdateConnectionWithCommunicationData
MethodExecute.designDesc: Update received information to the connection

MethodExecute.name: StoreObject
MethodExecute.designDesc: Store connection object

MethodExecute.designDesc: Store object

MethodExecute.name: StoreObject
MethodExecute.designDesc: Store objects

OperationExecute.name: CallCreateConnectionStructures
OperationExecute.designDesc: Call operation to create connection structures

OperationSpec.Description: Creates receiving connection, used for device initiated connection other end initiation.

MethodExecute.name: StoreConnection
MethodExecute.designDesc: Store connection object

OperationSpec.Description: Update both side categories of connection up-to-date with each other

MethodExecute.name: ExecuteProcessToUpdateThisSideCategories
MethodExecute.designDesc: Execute process to update this side categories

MethodExecute.name: SyncCategoriesWithOtherSideCategories
MethodExecute.designDesc: Get other side categories

MethodExecute.name: UpdateOtherSideCategories
MethodExecute.designDesc: Update connection's this side categories

MethodExecute.name: StoreObject
MethodExecute.designDesc: Store connection object

OperationSpec.Description: Delete Interface JSON object with given name

MethodExecute.name: DeleteJSONData
MethodExecute.designDesc: Delete data JSON from its location

OperationSpec.Description: Save Interface JSON object with given name

MethodExecute.designDesc: Save data JSON to location as serialized

OperationSpec.Description: Fetch URL data as group BinaryFile/MediaContent

Parameter.name: GroupID
Parameter.designDesc: Group ID to fetch data as for

Parameter.name: FileName
Parameter.designDesc: File name of data to be fetched

Parameter.name: DataURL
Parameter.designDesc: URL from where to fetch the data

TargetDefinition.name: BinaryFile
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Binary file to attach the mediacontent to

MethodExecute.name: FetchDataAndAttachToFile
MethodExecute.designDesc: Fetch data from URL and attach to file
